title: Creamy chicken and bacon pasta
ingredients: ['475ml double cream', '1 cube chicken stock', '1 tablespoon grated Asiago or Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '60g chopped sun-dried tomatoes', '450g farfalle pasta', '135g streaky bacon', '50g butter', '160g diced red onion', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '100g chopped spring onion', '450g grilled skinless, boneless chicken breast, diced', '250ml double cream', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
